LanguageData.BAW_Kokona.label: Lady's Grace
LanguageData.BAW_Kokona.description: An assault rifle that is effective both in protecting the dignity of a lady and in fulfilling her duties as an instructor.

LanguageData.BAW_Shun.label: Whip of Love
LanguageData.BAW_Shun.description:
Shun's sniper rifle.

No matter how naughty a child may be, they will immediately start behaving once Shun takes out this gun. 

Of course, she never actually points the gun at the children.
